data.title: Fujitsu Electronics America, Inc.
data.meta_description: Fujitsu Electronics America, Inc. (FEA) is a leading semiconductor and electronics solutions provider for the automotive, communications, consumer, industrial and other markets throughout North and South America.
data.text:
Company Overview

Fujitsu Electronics America, Inc. (FEA) is a leading semiconductor and electronics solutions provider for the automotive, communications, consumer, industrial and other markets throughout North and South America.

Founded in 1979 and headquartered in Sunnyvale, California, FEA is a subsidiary of Fujitsu Electronics, Inc. (FEI) of Japan. The companyâ€™s current name was changed on January 1, 2016 from Fujitsu Semiconductor America (FSA) to reflect the wider products and services offered to customers.

FEI, a member of the Fujitsu Semiconductor Limited (FSL) companies, is one of the largest semiconductor and electronics component distributors in the world.

FSL, originally the semiconductor division of Fujitsu Limited, was established in 2008 as a wholly owned subsidiary specializing in design and manufacture of highly complex custom and standard integrated circuits. Fujitsu Limited, based in Tokyo, is a leading provider of IT-based business solutions for the global marketplace. The company combines worldwide expertise in microelectronics and systems to provide highly reliable products and services for computation, communications and consumer applications. For more information, please see: http://www.fujitsu.com/global/about/ir/

Social Media

See http://www.fujitsu.com/global/socialmedia/ for a list of official Fujitsu social media accounts and details of our social media account policy.
